entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Biggar

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
